Interested In Building A NextGen Digital Experience?

Brian, 

I hope this finds you well. I wanted to share an opportunity to work for Kroger as a Developer on Kroger's elite development team working to build a cutting-edge e-commerce platform.

Kroger is a Fortune 20 company and the second largest retailer in the U.S. ranked in the top 50 companies to work for in technology by Computer World and based on your experience, I think you'd be a great fit. Let me know if you'd be interested!

Also, I'd love to hear your thoughts on the state of the job market. As in what does top-level talent need in a role to make it intriguing? Is it the project/tech stack, money, a combination of things etc....?

Let me know if you'd like to set up a conversation to discuss either of these topics!

Best,
Joop

Joop Roberts
jroberts@brooksource.com
What kind of project are they planning? I've adapted my boss' requirements for a company. He's narrowed it down to just one question: Do they use Git?

Brian, 

Thanks for getting back to me. Currently their main initiatives are the re-write their CMS from scratch, integrate their pharmacy into the e-commerce platform and create tools back-end for merchandising/pricing as well as focusing on customization and personalization for customers. 

To answer your question as well, Kroger uses Git heavily. Let me know if you're interested!

Joop
